items.title: “hanno un sogno, come lo hanno i loro coetanei italiani”
“È una cosa molto bella, per questo mi piace iniziare così la ‘Scuola della Parola’ di stasera”

“The guys who started probably softened up the opposition a little bit, and the bench came on to finish it,” “Manie (Libbok) came on and Sacha (Feinberg-Mngomezulu) moved to fullback – that worked well – so I thought everyone had a good impact, but that impact comes from the players understanding that it’s a 23-man effort. In our case it’s 34 guys on tour and I think the plans the coaches made at half time made it easier for the guys who came on”
“Serve una svolta politica che rimetta al centro lavoro e dignità”
